name: BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse
conditions: No purchase required; rewards sign-up recommended. May vary by location.
source: Manual entry – confirm with location or official rewards page.

name: Denny's
conditions: ID required; dine-in only; participation may vary by location.
source: Manual entry – commonly known birthday offer; verify locally.

name: Starbucks
conditions: Starbucks Rewards account required; birthday in profile at least 7 days before; at least one prior purchase required.
source: Official rewards terms – details can change yearly.

name: Señor Blues Karaoke
conditions: Reservation required; call ahead to confirm birthday promo.
source: Local knowledge / manual entry – verify directly with venue.

name: Red Robin
conditions: Rewards account required; valid once during your birthday month.
source: Official Red Robin Royalty birthday perk.

name: IHOP
conditions: Rewards account required; offer may arrive as email coupon.

name: Black Bear Diner
freebie: Free birthday meal or special offer
conditions: Must join Black Bear Diner E-Club; specific offer may vary by location and year.
source: Black Bear Diner email club info / common birthday promo.

name: Chili's
conditions: My Chili’s Rewards account required.

name: Olive Garden
conditions: Email club or rewards account required; participation may vary by location.
source: Olive Garden eClub / birthday freebies lists.

name: Buffalo Wild Wings
freebie: Free birthday wings (snack size or similar offer)
conditions: Blazin’ Rewards account required; exact offer may vary.

name: Texas Roadhouse
conditions: Must join their VIP Club or email list; offer may vary.
source: Texas Roadhouse email club birthday offer.

name: Baskin-Robbins
conditions: Must join the Birthday Club / Baskin-Robbins app.

name: Krispy Kreme
freebie: Free doughnut and sometimes a drink
conditions: Rewards account required; specific offer may vary by location.

name: Dutch Bros
conditions: Dutch Rewards account required; offer sent via app.

name: Cold Stone Creamery
conditions: Must join My Cold Stone Club; offer delivered by email.

name: Nothing Bundt Cakes
conditions: E-club / rewards sign-up required; offer may vary by location.

name: Dave & Buster's
freebie: Free $10 game play or similar birthday credit
conditions: D&B Rewards account required; amount and details may vary.

name: Jersey Mike's Subs
freebie: Free regular sub on your birthday
conditions: MyMike’s Rewards account required; birthday must be on file.

name: Firehouse Subs
conditions: Firehouse Rewards account required; valid on or near your birthday.

name: Panera Bread
conditions: Panera MyPanera account required; offer loaded to rewards.

name: Applebee's
conditions: Email club or rewards account required; participation may vary.

name: Wingstop
freebie: Free fries or similar birthday treat
conditions: Wingstop eClub or rewards sign-up required; specific offer varies.

name: Raising Cane's
freebie: Free birthday treat (often a free Box Combo or similar promo)
conditions: Caniac Club or app sign-up required; offer varies by market.
source: Raising Cane’s Caniac Club info / birthday lists.

name: Del Taco
freebie: Free premium shake or dessert item
conditions: Del Yeah! Rewards sign-up required; offer may change.

name: Jamba
conditions: Jamba Rewards account required; offer appears in app.

name: Auntie Anne's
conditions: Pretzel Perks app required; birthday reward sent to app.

name: Wetzel's Pretzels
conditions: Wetzel’s app account required; offer may vary.

name: Sephora
conditions: Beauty Insider membership required; options vary each year.

name: Ulta Beauty
freebie: Free birthday gift and bonus points
conditions: Ultamate Rewards membership required; specific gift varies by month and tier.

name: Round1 Bowling & Amusement
conditions: Membership or app sign-up required; birthday promo details vary.

name: Main Event
freebie: Birthday arcade credit or activity offer
conditions: Rewards or email sign-up required; offer varies by center.
source: Main Event rewards / birthday offer information.

name: Topgolf
freebie: Birthday game credit or coupon (varies by year)
conditions: Topgolf membership or email sign-up required; promos vary by venue.
